name: The Dev'ing On Trail
description:
Inspired by Spellkollektivet's Bonfire Jam 2020 Theme: "You Can't Do It Alone!", we set out on a game to describe, well, basically what we've been doing all year - working together to make games! Get ready to mix Oregon Trail, the pandemic of 2020, and your best partner gamedev'ing multiplayer skills, and travel The Dev' On Trail. 

This game was developed by Ashley Cooper & Brady Wright as part of the 2-day Spellkollektivet 2020 Bonfire Game Jam, August 28 - 30, 2020. 

Made with Unity.
